text: The Legend of Hell House is a 1973 British fantasy horror movie directed by John Hough and based on the 1971 novel Hell House by Richard Matheson. It stars Pamela Franklin, Roddy McDowall, Clive Revill, Gayle Hunnicutt, Roland Culver and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1973 horror movies Category:1973 fantasy movies Category:British horror movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by John Hough Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Legend of Hell House
